attributes.additional_details:
Save Dovers Green Playgroup  from possible closure

Dovers Green playgroup is a non-profit nursery providing early years care for the last 37 years  in the local community [woodhatch reigate] Surrey Council have given notice to vacate the site they run the nursery from by 6 December 2014 unless another site is found by then and made fit for purpose they will be forced to close.

We would like the Department for Education to work with Surrey Council and Early Years to unable the nursery to continue running and in helping avoid the nursery from closure as there is already a shortage of places for 3 - 4 yr old in the area
